statements: DELETE FROM LandUseForecasting WHERE location='New York' AND year=2023;
DELETE FROM LandUseForecasting WHERE land_use_type='Residential' OR land_use_type='Commercial';
DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE year < 2000 AND population <= 50000;
DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE year < 2000 AND population > 100000
DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE location_id = 100 AND year > 2010;
DELETE FROM predictive_model WHERE model_id IN (1, 2, 3);
DELETE FROM model_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'slope' AND model_id = 1;
DELETE FROM predicted_land_use WHERE land_type = 'Residential' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
